name: Scientific and Research Association for Art, Cultural and Educational programmes and Technology EPEKA, social enterprise
goal:
EPEKA Association, Social Enterprise is non-profit, non-governmental organization from Maribor, Slovenia. We are also network organization with the sister organizations in Austria, Germany, Serbia, Montenegro, UK and Kosovo.
We are active on the field of Culture, Art, Youth, Education, Social entrepreneurship, Ecology etc.
We are promoting EU values as intercultural dialogue, EU citizenship, active citizenship and sustainability.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Communication, Culture, Digital economy and society, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, Environment, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Migration and asylum, Public Health, Sport, Youth
euInitiatives: We are focusing on all the EU initiatives, policies and legislative files concerning EU values, peace, equality, intercultural dialogue, human rights and freedom.
